title: Fully Dynamic Shortest Paths in Sparse Digraphs
abstract:
We study the exact fully dynamic shortest paths problem. For real-weighted
directed graphs, we show a deterministic fully dynamic data structure with
$\tilde{O}(mn^{4/5})$ worst-case update time processing arbitrary
$s,t$-distance queries in $\tilde{O}(n^{4/5})$ time. This constitutes the first
non-trivial update/query tradeoff for this problem in the regime of sparse
weighted directed graphs.
